biotools.summary:
Manually curated online database of experimentally validated functional LIR motifs.
LIRcentral contains information about manually curated entries of LIR-motifs that have been experimentally tested for their ability to bind Atg8 homologs, often in a biologically relevant context.

bioschemas.name: LIRcentral
bioschemas.summary:
Manually curated online database of experimentally validated functional LIR motifs.
LIRcentral contains information about manually curated entries of LIR-motifs that have been experimentally tested for their ability to bind Atg8 homologs, often in a biologically relevant context.
